sessions.description: Check in at registration to unlock your full FUSION experience. Registration is on Level 1, right across from the lounge in the conference area. Want to stay one step ahead? Download the mobile app and get the inside scoop before the action begins.

sessions.title: Partner FUSION: Why Partners Who Lead with Agentic Automation Will Win
sessions.speaker: (cassidy.henry@uipath.com,Moderator)(Daniel.dines@uipath.com,Speaker)(graham.sheldon@uipath.com,Speaker)(ashim.gupta@uipath.com,Speaker)(ben.fiechtner@uipath.com,Speaker)(phillip.clay@uipath.com,Speaker)

sessions.title: Welcome Reception
sessions.description: Get ready to mix, mingle, and ignite ideas! Join us for curated bites, crafted drinks, and lively conversation as we launch FUSION. Meet the trailblazers redefining the future of agentic AI and automation—this is your chance to connect, be inspired, and celebrate innovation.

sessions.title: Registration
sessions.description: Check in at registration to unlock your full FUSION experience. Registration is on Level 1, right across from the lounge in the conference area. Want to stay one step ahead? Download the mobile app and get the inside scoop before the action begins.

sessions.title: Breakfast
sessions.description: Fuel up and connect! Join us for a networking breakfast with fellow agentic AI and automation professionals before the FUSION keynotes begin. Vegetarian, gluten-free, and dairy-free options are available—just ask.

sessions.title: The Path to Impact: Igniting Agentic AI Possibilities
sessions.speaker: (ben.fiechtner@uipath.com,Keynote)
sessions.description: Join Ben Fiechtner, President of the Americas, as he sets the stage for FUSION with a dynamic preview of what's in store over the next two days.

sessions.title: UiPath Vision of an Agentic World
sessions.speaker: (Daniel.dines@uipath.com,Keynote)
sessions.description: In this keynote, UiPath CEO and Co-Founder Daniel Dines unveils a bold vision for an agentic future—where autonomous AI agents, robots, and people are orchestrated with governance and control to transform how work gets done and deliver enterprise-scale ROI.

sessions.title: Getting the Most from Agentic Automation Now
sessions.speaker: (graham.sheldon@uipath.com,Keynote)
sessions.description: Join UiPath Chief Product Officer Graham Sheldon as he shares how organizations are already deploying agentic automation to solve real business challenges—unlocking value today with AI-powered agents, reusable components, and enterprise-grade orchestration.

sessions.title: The Agent Experience
sessions.speaker: (place.holder5@uipath.com,Keynote)
sessions.description: Craig Le Clair shares his view of agentic automation, enabled by AI agents, as a significant shift that will reshape enterprise workflow automation and potentially lead to hypergrowth. He’ll discuss findings and implications of the agent experience (AX) derived from new research and his new book, “Random Acts of Automation.”

sessions.title: Lunch and Hosted Roundtable Topic Discussions
sessions.description:
Join us in the Lafite Ballroom for a seated lunch paired with interactive roundtable discussions led by industry peers. These expert-hosted conversations are designed to spark fresh ideas and insightful dialogue around the future of agentic AI and automation. 

Vegetarian, gluten-free, and dairy-free options are available upon request.

sessions.title: Agent Ideation Office Hours to Get You Ready for the Agentic Hack-a-Thon: Formulate, Harden, Launch
sessions.description:
Elevate your agent concepts and get hack‑ready. In this interactive office‑hours session, our facilitators will unpack the core elements of a powerful agent, then guide you through refining your own idea. You’ll leave with a rock‑solid concept and early access to the Agentic Hack‑a‑Thon environment so you can dive into building right away tomorrow.

What to Expect: 

•Work through a structured framework to sharpen your agentic idea
•Collaborate with peers to surface edge cases, use‑case nuances, and differentiation points
•Secure your hackathon setup: environment access, credentials, and lab resources for day two
Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. This interactive session may require remote desktop access (VM access recommended). Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Agentic Testing Unleashed: Build, Automate, Accelerate
sessions.description:
Step into the future of software testing. In this hands-on workshop, you’ll build and deploy AI-driven test agents using UiPath Test Cloud and  learn how to apply agentic testing strategies to accelerate and scale test automation across your tech stack. You’ll work with tools like Autopilot for Testers and Agent Builder to design, automate, and manage tests with intelligent agents—then integrate them into CI/CD pipelines for continuous quality at speed. From intelligent test creation to execution and reporting, this session shows how Test Cloud transforms the testing lifecycle. Ideal for testers, developers, and QA professionals, this session gives you practical skills to modernize testing with AI and automation.  

What to Expect: 

•Build AI test agents using Agent Builder and Autopilot 
•Gain hands-on automation experience across the full testing lifecycle 
•View CI/CD integration and real-time reporting in Test Cloud 
•Learn practical skills to improve quality and speed 
Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. This interactive session may require remote desktop access (VM access recommended). Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Meet the Experts
sessions.description:
Step into the Agentic Arena — where innovation meets expertise.
Discover how agentic automation is reshaping the future of work, guided by the sharpest minds in AI transformation. UiPath and our top-tier partners will be there to dive into your toughest questions, explore your biggest challenges, and share insights you won't hear anywhere else.

sessions.title: Unstructured In, Action Out: Hands-On with IXP
sessions.description:
Turn unstructured chaos into streamlined action. In this hands-on workshop, you’ll build end-to-end automations using the UiPath Intelligent Xtraction and Processing (IXP) platform—powered by Communications Mining and Document Understanding. Learn how to process inbound emails and documents, extract key data, and drive business outcomes with tools like CommPath LLM, DocPath LLM, and Generative Extraction. From intake to resolution, this session shows you how to turn complexity into clarity. Designed for developers and process owners, you’ll gain practical experience in training models, designing extraction flows, and building automations at scale. 

What to Expect: 

•Build workflows using UiPath IXP and Gen AI tools 
•Automate unstructured inputs like emails and PDFs 
•Gain hands-on training in communications and document extraction 
•Leave with scalable workflows and practical skills 
Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. This interactive session may require remote desktop access (VM access recommended). Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Orchestrating Outcomes: How Cross-Industry Early Movers Are Scaling Agentic Automation
sessions.speaker: (janette.hausler@uipath.com,Moderator)(pkistner@allegisglobalsolutions.com,Speaker)(Neil.Kalmes@evernorth.com,Speaker)
sessions.description: Across industries, organizations are moving from fragmented automation efforts to connected, outcome-focused systems of work. In this session, hear how early mover leaders zeroed in on high-impact use cases, orchestrated complex workflows, and delivered real business value along the way. From reconciling invoices to auditing contracts, they’re turning to the combination of agents, robots, and people so they can scale faster, smarter, and with purpose.

sessions.title: How-To Theater
sessions.speaker: (taqi.jaffri@uipath.com,Moderator)(daniela.rosenstein@catonetworks.com,Speaker)(vanitha.preston@cslbehring.com,Speaker)
sessions.description:
Hear from the Trailblazers of Agentic AI 
Get an inside look at how pioneering customers are successfully putting agentic AI into action. They'll share real-world strategies, lessons learned, and what’s working now. Spotlighting those harnessing the power of low-code, pro-code, and Maestro, these stories showcase how to drive meaningful, measurable outcomes with confidence.

sessions.title: The FUSION Advantage Theater
sessions.speaker: (janette.hausler@uipath.com,Moderator)(emily.krohne@wexinc.com,Speaker)(pkistner@allegisglobalsolutions.com,Speaker)(Alfred.Ochoa@sce.com,Speaker)(zeth.baker@clorox.com,Speaker)(Neil.Kalmes@evernorth.com,Speaker)(cmiranda@rtix.com,Speaker)
sessions.description:
Hear from the Visionaries Shaping the Future of Agentic AI 
Join forward-thinking leaders as they share their bold perspectives on embracing agentic AI to spark innovation, boost agility, and unlock lasting competitive edge. These are the pioneers reimagining what’s possible—and showing how to get there.

sessions.title: The Agentified Contact Center: How WEX, Southern California Edison, and Evergen Are Elevating Customer Experience
sessions.speaker: (emily.krohne@wexinc.com,Speaker)(cmiranda@rtix.com,Speaker)(Alfred.Ochoa@sce.com,Speaker)
sessions.description:
Customers today expect fast, personalized answers. Industry leaders like WEX, SCE, and Evergen are showing how agentic automation helps make that possible in the contact center—each in their own way. From accelerating email replies in financial services, to guiding agents through complex utility billing conversations, to matching patients with donor tissue faster in healthcare, they’re finding smarter ways to meet rising expectations.




Join the session to hear their stories, lessons learned, and ideas you can run with to unlock insights and scale success for your customers.

sessions.title: Cocktails and Nibbles
sessions.description: Join us for an evening of cocktails and light fare in the Agentic Arena. Connect with fellow agentic AI and automation practitioners, alongside UiPath and partner experts offering the perfect opportunity to engage with industry leaders and peers.

sessions.title: Registration
sessions.description: Check in at registration to unlock your full FUSION experience. Registration is on Level 1, right across from the lounge in the conference area. Want to stay one step ahead? Download the mobile app and get the inside scoop before the action begins.

sessions.title: Breakfast
sessions.description: Fuel up and connect! Join us for a networking breakfast with fellow agentic AI and automation professionals before our industry summits and workshops begin. Vegetarian, gluten-free, and dairy-free options are available—just ask.

sessions.title: Women in Automation – Leading with Impact
sessions.speaker: (molly.mecham@uipath.com,Moderator)(meghan@fifcollective.co,Speaker)(pfstrzempek@geisinger.edu,Speaker)
sessions.description: Celebrate the voices driving automation forward. This session spotlights bold perspectives on innovation, inclusion, and navigating the evolving tech landscape. Be inspired by real stories—and empowered to lead your own.

sessions.title: Unstructured In, Action Out: Hands-On with IXP
sessions.description:
Turn unstructured chaos into streamlined action. In this hands-on workshop, you’ll build end-to-end automations using UiPath’s Intelligent Xtraction and Processing (IXP) platform—powered by Communications Mining and Document Understanding. Learn how to process inbound emails and documents, extract key data, and drive business outcomes with tools like CommPath LLM, DocPath LLM, and Generative Extraction. From intake to resolution, this session shows you how to turn complexity into clarity. Designed for developers and process owners, you’ll gain practical experience in training models, designing extraction flows, and building automations at scale. 

What to Expect: 

•Build workflows using UiPath IXP and Gen AI tools 
•Automate unstructured inputs like emails and PDFs 
•Gain hands-on training in communications and document extraction 
•Leave with scalable workflows and practical skills 
Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. This interactive session may require remote desktop access (VM access recommended). Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

sessions.title: Cross-Industry Panel Discussions: Orchestrating People, Strategy and Technology to Amplify ROI
sessions.speaker: (caleb.jones@uipath.com,Speaker)(bob.sacunas@uipath.com,Speaker)(siddharth.shah@intel.com,Speaker)(vinay.gangidi@ansys.com,Speaker)(wykita.riley@delta.com,Speaker)(matt.dussling@uipath.com,Speaker)(aaron.goodrich@loves.com,Speaker)(flosshilda.labrado@t-mobile.com,Speaker)
sessions.description:
9:00 - Welcome

Join Caleb Jones, UiPath Strategic Engagement Executive, for a brief welcome and introduction of the panel participants ad topic.

9:05 - Breaking Silos: Intelligent Process Optimization 

This panel brings together leaders who’ve transformed operations in finance, legal, and marketing using agentic automation. Hear how they’ve deployed AI-driven solutions that stay compliant and still deliver real ROI in highly regulated spaces. Discover how to spot high-impact opportunities and build unified strategies for end-to-end process transformation.  

9:50 - Break

10:00 - Welcome

10:05 - Seamless CX: The Agentic Customer Journey 

See how top organizations are using agentic automation to reimagine customer experiences. Leaders will share how AI agents are helping personalize interactions, simplify service, and stay one step ahead of customer needs. Learn how they’re combining smart automation with the human touch—and building systems that get better with every interaction.  

10:50 - Break

11:00 - Welcome

11:05 - Intelligent Quality Assurance: The New Rules in Test Automation 

With software complexity on the rise, autonomous AI agents are changing the game in QA. Experts will show how agentic testing strategies bring together human insight and AI speed to boost test coverage and shorten feedback loops. Get practical tips on plugging agentic testing into your CI/CD pipelines and scaling smart testing frameworks that grow with your needs.

sessions.title: FUSION Financial Services Summit: Delivering Transformative Business Value Today
sessions.description:
Explore how leading financial services organizations are scaling automation and AI to solve complex challenges and deliver value across the enterprise—without waiting for specialized talent or new infrastructure. This summit dives into real-world examples of how agentic automation delivers measurable outcomes in compliance, customer experience, onboarding, and more. With a full lineup of live demos, candid leadership discussions from your financial services industry peers, and production-ready stories, you’ll leave with clear strategies and proven approaches to accelerate transformation using the resources you already have.

9:00 - Welcome and Housekeeping

Kick off the day with key themes: AI, automation, and transformation in financial services, plus an overview of sessions and how to engage.

9:05 - Tech Showcase: “Orchestrating the Path to Production: Agentic Automation for Scale" 

Guided by Accenture and rooted in demonstrable visual demos: This session will first provide an overview of the changing automation landscape, and then, using a real-world demo, showcase how agentic automation unlocks new possibilities for operational efficiency, customer experience, and compliance in financial services. 

9:35 - Executive Fireside Chat: Built to Scale: Operationalizing AI and Agentic Automation 

A candid conversation on what it takes to scale AI and automation across the enterprise, with lessons in technology alignment, strategy, and execution. 

10:05 - Panel: From RPA to Agentic – Leading the Organizational Shift 

This panel brings together senior automation leaders to share how their organizations are evolving from structured RPA to intelligent, agentic automation. We’ll explore lessons learned, organizational hurdles, and strategic plays that helped them win executive buy-in and drive adoption.

10:35 - Spotlights: Production-Ready Stories 

These 10-minute customer spotlight sessions will highlight real-world, production-grade deployments of agentic automation. Presenters will walk through specific challenges, implementation approaches, and measurable business results. 

11:10 - Commercial Lending QA/QC - Product Launch

11:30 - How are AI and Automation Teams Coming Together 

As AI initiatives gain momentum across financial institutions, many remain siloed from the RPA and automation programs that could help them scale. This session explores how organizations are evolving their operating models to bring AI and automation teams together—eliminating redundancy, accelerating time to value, and delivering unified business impact. 

11:50 - Closing Remarks / Awards 

The final session will tie together key themes from the day—agentic automation, business transformation, and the power of convergence. We’ll reflect on the most resonant insights, acknowledge standout contributions, and preview what comes next for our financial services community.

sessions.title: Healthcare Payer Summit: The New Agentic Power Grid for Health Plans
sessions.speaker: (jason.bui@uipath.com,Speaker)(bdspicer@arkbluecross.com,Speaker)(Neil.Kalmes@evernorth.com,Speaker)(Dan.Deschamps@azblue.com,Speaker)(Jayaprakash.Padiyar@azblue.com,Speaker)(Prasoon.Shrivastava@evernorth.com,Speaker)
sessions.description:
Payers today are navigating one of the most complex operating environments in healthcare history—balancing rising costs, growing regulatory pressure, and sky-high member expectations. 

It’s clear: outdated systems and fragmented processes can’t keep up.

This year, we introduce the new agentic power grid for payers — a connected, intelligent infrastructure that transforms how payer organizations operate, decide, and serve. Agentic automation is at the heart of this shift: autonomous digital agents that can adapt, optimize, and orchestrate in real time across the payer ecosystem.

At this summit, we bring to life a new kind of operational power — one fueled by:

•Community: A network of forward-thinking payer leaders sharing strategies to manage complexity, improve agility, and deliver better outcomes.
•Content: Bold ideas and real-world success stories that show what happens when payers automate not just tasks, but end-to-end decisions.
•Consultation: Expert guidance to help your organization plug into the agentic grid—simplifying prior auth, accelerating claims, reducing risk, and transforming member experiences.
With the right architecture, organizations are not only modernizing operations but also unlocking rapid, measurable ROI from their investments in agentic automation.

It’s time to plug into a different model for payer operations for precision, scale, and resilience.

Welcome to the grid.

9:00 - The Autonomy Uplink: Where Payers Are Headed with UiPath

We'll kick things off with a high-voltage overview of big ideas and big customer wins. 

9:30 - Live Currents: Payer Voices from the Agentic Grid

Get inspired by payer organizations who are actively building agentic automation programs around major use cases. With solo presentations and a panel of business leaders and automation experts, you'll leave with plenty of energy and insights to power your agentic strategy. 

11:00 - GridOps LIVE: Inside the Agentic Engine

The most innovative use cases, the best in agentic technology--UiPath engineers will set the stage on fire with live demos.

sessions.title: Healthcare Provider Summit: The New Agentic Power Grid for Healthcare Providers
sessions.description:
Provider organizations are under immense pressure — labor shortages, clinician burnout, rising costs, and administrative overload are straining the entire system. To deliver better care and create sustainable operations, we need more than automation. We need intelligence, adaptability, and orchestration.

Welcome to the New Agentic Power Grid for Providers — a dynamic infrastructure powered by intelligent automation that doesn’t just perform tasks but understands context, responds to change, and elevates human potential across clinical and operational workflows.

At this summit, we’re building that grid together — with a focus on:

•Community: A collaborative network of healthcare leaders and changemakers redefining what’s possible in modern care delivery.
•Content: Breakthrough ideas and case studies showing how agentic automation reduces administrative burden, improves throughput, and supports overextended teams.
•Consultation: Direct access to experts who help providers plug into the agentic grid to streamline revenue cycle, enhance care coordination, reduce denials, and drive clinician satisfaction.
More than transformation, this is acceleration — with organizations across the care continuum already achieving fast, measurable ROI on their agentic automation investments.

The future of healthcare isn’t just connected — it’s orchestrated.

 Welcome to the grid.

9:00 - Energy Index: Impact to Care Progress Report

We'll kick off with a high energy readout of the impact of agentic automation on healthcare providers over the last 12 months.

9:30 - Gridlines: Provider Stories That Connect and Scale

Hear from business and technology leaders on how they've used agentic automation to streamline business operations and spark big outcomes. With solo presentations and a dynamic customer panel, you'll walk away engergized, inspired, and ready to tackle your own agentic vision. 

11:30 - Live from the Grid: Real Provider Solutions in Real Time

The most innovative use cases, the best in agentic technology--UiPath engineers will set the stage on fire with live demos.

sessions.title: Life Sciences Industry Summit: Blueprints for Breakthroughs — Automating Innovation Across Life Sciences
sessions.speaker: (cmiranda@rtix.com,Speaker)(vanitha.preston@cslbehring.com,Speaker)(henry.trinh@cslbehring.com,Speaker)(gita.malladi@abbvie.com,Speaker)(kim.kraus@abbvie.com,Speaker)(aaron.white@cslbehring.com,Speaker)
sessions.description: Discover how life sciences organizations are using agentic automation and Gen AI to accelerate innovation and drive transformative results today. Through a mix of panel discussions, demos, and real-world case studies, this summit features success stories and practical strategies across R&D, quality, regulatory, and commercial operations. Designed for professionals in pharma, biotech, and medical devices, the agenda offers a clear blueprint for scaling automation effectively in your environment—using the teams and resources you already have. Join us to connect with your peers, share insights, and exchange ideas with others navigating similar challenges.

sessions.title: Manufacturing Industry Summit: Orchestrating the Future of Manufacturing and CPG: Breaking the Industry 3.9 Rut
sessions.description:
Manufacturers aren’t experimenting with automation anymore; they’re scaling it. This summit dives into how manufacturing organizations are applying agentic automation and Gen AI to connect operations, boost agility, and drive real results across supply chain, production, and quality. Through live demos, curated panel discussions, and production-ready use cases, you’ll see how teams in manufacturing are reducing downtime, speeding up decision-making, and empowering the workforce. Built for leaders in operations, supply chain, IT, and digital transformation, this summit also offers plenty of chances to connect with peers and UiPath experts.

9:00 - Orchestrating the Future of Manufacturing and CPG 

Welcome

9:05 - State of Manufacturing: Breaking the Industry 3.9 Rut Featuring Love’s Travel Stores

An in-depth analysis of current manufacturing challenges and the industry's position at the crossroads of 3.9 and true Industry 4.0 transformation. See how Love’s is having tremendous success combing test automation with physical robots to test their point-of-sale systems.  

9:30 - Leveraging Automation: See How to Enter the Agentic Space Featuring Conagra Brands

Discover how leading manufacturers are qualifying and implementing agentic programs to break down silos and create unified visibility across operations.  

9:55 - Getting over Your Nerves: First Steps Into Agentic Orchestration, Featuring Wesco Distribution

Practical case studies showcasing how big ideas are becoming reality through intelligent automation.  

More to come

sessions.title: Public Sector Summit: Accelerate Mission Outcomes with Agentic Automation
sessions.speaker: (treasa.hunt@nebraska.gov,Speaker)
sessions.description: Public sector organizations are under pressure to modernize services, manage limited resources, and meet increasing demands—all while maintaining accountability and compliance. This summit specially designed for public sector attendees explores how government teams are using agentic automation to improve audit readiness, optimize workforce capacity, and modernize legacy systems without costly overhauls. Through a mix of real-world case studies, actionable insights, and live demonstrations, you’ll see how automation helps agencies deliver faster, smarter, and more resilient public services. Attendees will also have opportunities to connect with peers and speak directly with UiPath experts who understand the unique mission needs of the public sector.

sessions.title: UiPath Community Developer Playground​
UiPath Community: Agentic Hack-a-Thon
sessions.description:
Join a vibrant developer community to co‑build agent features that matter to you—collaborate with product experts and industry peers, leverage our pre‑built platform components, and dive deep into our latest features. Our product experts will help you build and refine your agentic idea, and you'll leave the hack-a-thon with a functional agent prototype and strategic guidance to scale it.

What to Expect: 

•Access a dedicated environment pre‑loaded with platform‑wide components
•Collaborate hands‑on with product experts 
•Connect with UiPath Community MVPs and industry peers 
Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. This interactive session may require remote desktop access (VM access recommended). Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

Guided by AI experts, you'll learn practical frameworks, build simple agent flows, and walk away with actionable strategies you can take back to your team. Whether you're low-code curious or a seasoned pro-code developer, this session will fuel your innovation roadmap.

sessions.title: Welcome to Day Two
sessions.speaker: (ben.fiechtner@uipath.com,Keynote)
sessions.description: Join Ben Fiechtner, President of the Americas, as he kicks off our afternoon keynotes exploring the breakthroughs, trends, and bold moves driving the next wave of agentic AI and automation.

sessions.title: The Impact of Enterprise-Wide Agentic Automation
sessions.speaker: (placeholder@stanford.edu,Speaker)
sessions.description: AI represents the most transformative General Purpose Technology since the Industrial Revolution, with agentic AI having the potential for automating work across enterprises. Early studies found productivity gains of 15-50% for customer service agents, software engineers, and managers, but these micro-level benefits have not yet translated to economy-wide productivity growth, suggesting we are in the early stages of a “productivity J-curve”. Erik will discuss that, to harness AI, enterprises must more strategically deploy AI tools and agents across business processes and establish better measurement frameworks to identify and quantify their rapidly evolving benefits.

sessions.title: The Trusted Platform for Agentic Automation + Agentic Labs Kick-Off
sessions.speaker: (raghu.malpani@uipath.com,Keynote)
sessions.description: UiPath CTO Raghu Malpani explores the platform behind secure, scalable agentic automation—showing how UiPath enables AI agents with policy-driven orchestration, built-in auditability, and seamless integration across enterprise systems to deliver end-to-end trust, control, and performance.

sessions.title: FUSION Mingle Dinner
sessions.description: Join us for our FUSION mingle dinner where you can unwind, connect, and reflect with fellow professionals over exquisite cuisine in a relaxed, elegant setting. It’s the perfect finale to a day of inspiration—fueling fresh ideas and forging meaningful connections. network with industry peers, exchange ideas, and build valuable relationships in a relaxed, elegant setting.

sessions.title: Exclusive Evening Experience: Awakening Show at Wynn Las Vegas
sessions.description:
Prepare to be captivated by the mesmerizing Awakening show at Wynn Las Vegas—a stunning fusion of acrobatics, music, and visual artistry that promises to inspire and awe.

This exclusive event is the perfect blend of business and entertainment, designed to spark new conversations and leave a lasting impression. Don’t miss this opportunity to engage, unwind, and experience one of Las Vegas’s most acclaimed performances.

Choose from multiple curated AI developer‑focused tracks, each anchored by a product‑leader keynote and multiple deep‑dive sessions that bridge thought leadership with hands‑on learning. In these interactive labs, you'll roll up your sleeves and explore how agentic AI and automation can be deployed to solve real business problems—today. Guided by AI experts, you'll learn practical frameworks, build simple agent flows, and walk away with actionable strategies you can take back to your team. Whether you're low-code curious or a seasoned pro-code developer, this session will fuel your innovation roadmap.

What to Expect: 

•Explore curated developer tracks with product‑leader keynotes and hands‑on deep dives
•Build practical agent flows using our platform components and proven frameworks
•Collaborate with AI experts and a vibrant developer community
Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. This interactive session may require remote desktop access (VM access recommended). Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.

Pre-Requisites: 

Bring your laptop and be ready to build. This interactive session may require remote desktop access (VM access recommended). Seats are limited to ensure a high-touch experience—secure yours early.
